description: Kill the giant wolf roaming the fields for the Valhallists.  Return to their leader when it is dead.

dialogue.describe: Kill a giant wolf to join the Valhallists.
dialogue.success: Welcome to the clan.  We'll get to making a helmet for you straight away.  Gudene vil det!
dialogue.failure: Not everyone is cut out for this life, I suppose.

dialogue.describe: Destroy a fungal bloom for the Valhallists.
dialogue.offer: My scouts have reported activity of those <mycus_slur>s nearby, a huge nest that's been interfering with our scouting runs.  I want you to go over there and burn their colony to ash.  I have some Molotovs ready for you to do that with.
dialogue.rejected: They'll pay with their lives eventually.
dialogue.advice: Wear a gas mask and a hazard suit, which I wish we had to lend you.  Walking in those spore clouds can get you infected with them, and I'd rather not have to send an assassin to incinerate you.  I've seen it too many times, quite the horrid process.
dialogue.inquire: I don't see any ash on you.
dialogue.success: It was too dangerous to keep them around.  Thank you.
dialogue.failure: Not everyone is cut out for this life, I suppose.

dialogue.offer: You've proven yourself as a competent warrior, and we need your services again.  Scavenging runs have been delayed recently due to hordes of undead blocking off towns, and nearly killing one of us last time.  I need you to help exterminate this threat, so go kill three hundred of those <name_b>s for us.
dialogue.rejected: We are going to have to face them sometime, now is better than ever.
dialogue.advice: Slay a few at a time, and don't let them surround you.
dialogue.inquire: Are the dead laid to rest?
dialogue.success: We'll see great success in the future now that our supply lines are open again.  Thank you.
dialogue.failure: Not everyone is cut out for this life, I suppose.

description: Find a mi-go scout tower and kill its residents.

dialogue.describe: Clear out a mi-go tower for the Valhallists.
dialogue.offer: We've found more aliens in the area.  My scouts have reported a strange tower for those weird multi limbed aliens showed up recently, and that they were seen taking some people inside.  I want you to go over there and kill all the residents, and find out what happened to those people.  If they're still alive, I want you to bring them back here when you're done, and tell me what you saw.
dialogue.rejected: They'll pay with their lives eventually, why wait?.
dialogue.advice: That tower is like a furnace, even outside our scouts could feel the heat.  They've got to have something generating it, so I'd destroy whatever's doing so.  Those aliens have also been observed tearing through whole hordes of <zombie>s by themselves, I'd recommend keeping your distance.  Don't trust any human sounds you hear near there too, we've seen them parrot everything.
dialogue.inquire: You're pretty clean for someone who has bloody work on their hands.
dialogue.success: Who knows what they were planning in there, or what they've done…  You've done a good job.
dialogue.success_lie: I can still hear their screams at night.
dialogue.failure: Not everyone is cut out for this life, I suppose.

dialogue.offer: We've had recent success in securing ourselves, now I think it's time to take grander strides.  The <zombies> are proving to be an ever-present threat to us, and thinning their numbers would prove handy.  If you so wish, I will provide a handsome reward for you.
dialogue.rejected: If we don't kill them now, they'll only come for us later.  It's better to fight them on our terms.
dialogue.advice: Slay a few at a time, and don't let them surround you.
dialogue.inquire: Are the dead laid to rest?
dialogue.success: You have done a great work for us today.
dialogue.success_lie: We've still had problems with them, doesn't seem like anyone's helped.
dialogue.failure: Not everyone is cut out for this life, I suppose.

dialogue.offer: We've been trying to deal with some fungal infestations, but we need some hazmat suits to keep the spores off of us.  With those, we could circumvent their biggest threat and keep the back.  I'll pay you liberally with whatever we have in stock.
dialogue.rejected: Do you have any better ideas?
dialogue.advice: One of those old waste containment facilities should have a few, along with some science labs or chemical factories.
dialogue.success: I can't thank you enough for what you've done.  If you ever need to loan one of them, I'd be glad to lend it.
dialogue.failure: I'll have to do it myself, I guess.

dialogue.offer: Those hazmat suits really helped out with the fungus problem, but we're in need of incendiaries to burn up those fungal beds.  If you could get me thirty glass bottles, I can provide the rest of what we need for the Molotovs.  How's that sound for a days' work?
dialogue.rejected: Do you have any better ideas?
dialogue.advice: Check some grocery stores or bars in town, they should have a lot.
dialogue.success: Hopefully that wasn't too hard.  I'll see about getting some more in the long term.
dialogue.failure: I'll have to do it myself, I guess.

dialogue.describe: Bring me one hundred mushroom spores.
dialogue.offer: I've decided to start diversifying the tings we grow to make some money on farming.  Right now, I need to get one hundred mushroom spores to start the colony, but I haven't the slightest idea where.  If you could find some, I'd pay fairly for them.
dialogue.rejected: Do you have any better ideas?
dialogue.advice: If you know anything about wild fungi, you could make some starters from those.
dialogue.success: I'll pass these along, then.  They should grow in about a month or so.
dialogue.failure: I'll have to do it myself, I guess.

name: Establish A Trade Route
description: Establish trade relations between the evangelicals and a refugee center, and bring back a writ of the agreement.

dialogue.offer: One of our raiding parties was out the other day, and came across an old evac shelter.  They managed to pull and address for some sort of government center off the computer, and I mapped it out.  I figure they could make good trade partners if anyone's over there, so I want you to go and investigate, and strike a deal with them if possible.
dialogue.advice: It should be pretty simple, but I'd recommend taking a car over there myself.  We have lots of spare household goods to sell in bulk, if anyone wants them.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Please?  This is really important to me.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess I'll have to find other customers.

description: Rescue a raiding party that got stuck in town.

dialogue.offer: One of the raiding parties sent out a distress signal.  They're stuck in town on the roof of a house and are surrounded, with only enough supplies for a few days.  I need you to go over there, rescue them, and bring them back alive.
dialogue.rejected: They'll die out there if no one helps!  Have you no mercy?
dialogue.advice: If you don't want to fight anything, sneak them out at night.  If not, bring a melee weapon or a bow; guns will draw out half the city.
dialogue.success: Blessed be thee, they are saved!  Come, let us rejoice for your deeds!
dialogue.success_lie: Strange, they should've been back by now.
dialogue.failure: I'll go prepare their funerary rites…

dialogue.offer: I've been looking into some of the stranger things we've have documented.  The other day, we found an old mine filled with spiral patters and strange creatures.  I want you to bring me a sample of the patterns from that place, so that I may study it.
dialogue.rejected: I can understand if you don't want to.
dialogue.advice: The team turned around after getting in a firefight with something down there, they couldn't describe what.  I'd be careful.
dialogue.success: Hopefully that wasn't too hard.  I should have some results in a couple of days.
dialogue.failure: Ah, well.  I'll see about an alternative.

description: Eliminate a bandit gang in exchange for <reward_count:signed_chit> chits.

dialogue.offer: We've had some bandits trying to encroach on the local area.  We've picked up a radio broadcast for one of their campsites, so I want you to go over and kill every <name_b> who's there.  You'll get a payment from me, and you'll have claim to all the stuff they were carrying.
dialogue.accepted: Be careful out there, they're ruthless individuals.
dialogue.rejected: There's quite a bit in it for you…
dialogue.advice: I'd bring some anti-personnel grenades if it were me.
dialogue.success: Thank you, the world is a better place without those scum.
dialogue.success_lie: The radio must not have shut off, I'm still picking up a broadcast.

description: Rescue slaves from a raider encampment for <reward_count:signed_chit> chits.

dialogue.offer: We've tracked down a large group of raiders, and our scouts have reported that slaves and prisoners are being held there.  I need you to destroy the camp and free those slaves, then bring them back here.  We'll give them room and board, and see to their wellbeing for the time.
dialogue.rejected: Are you certain?  It'll be worth your while.
dialogue.advice: I'd ambush the camp at night, take them by surprise.  They've got the perimeter trapped with mines and someone's always at the gates, so try going over one of the walls.  Bring some friends along with you too, they're numerous and all armed to the teeth.
dialogue.success: The world will be a better place without thieves walking its surface, practicing such barbaric things.
dialogue.failure: Its unfortunate, how many fall to barbarism…

dialogue.offer: With all the repairs we've been doing around here, my team is running low on welding gas.  Without it, I can't fix any busted bikes or make any new ones, so I need you to get me twenty-five liters of oxyacetylene.  I'll pay you well for it.
dialogue.rejected: Those bikes are vital to our operations, we'll collapse without them.
dialogue.advice: I'd check a garage in town.
dialogue.success: This ought'a keep us afloat for a bit.  If you need any mechanical work done, come by and see me.
dialogue.failure: I'll have to do it myself, I guess.

dialogue.offer: The oxyacetylene pulled us through, but now we're out of welding rods.  If you could get about 100, I'll buy 'em.
dialogue.rejected: I can't work without them, ya know.
dialogue.advice: I'd check a garage in town, or you could make your own.
dialogue.success: This ought'a keep us afloat for a bit.
dialogue.failure: I'll have to do it myself, I guess.

dialogue.offer: There's been a few too many flats around here, and I'm low on working tires.  If you bring me 25 of them, I'll pay fairly.
dialogue.rejected: You can always walk, if ya want.
dialogue.advice: Some crashed bikes along the highway might have intact wheels.
dialogue.success: This ought'a keep us afloat for a bit.  I'll get the work rolling.
dialogue.failure: I'll have to do it myself, I guess.
